A4.text: Michelle Fairley's acting as Catelyn gathers allies to arrest Tyrion.

A5.text: Michelle Fairley's fantastic performance captures the horror, with the edge of desperation, anguish, and madness of a woman who has lost her sons, lost her grandchild, may have lost her daughters, and for all she knows, is witnessing the extinction of the house she belongs to.

A7.text: The role of Catelyn Stark was played initially by Jennifer Ehle, but the role was recast with Michelle Fairley.
